title: Stylized Grass Field
description: Vast Stylized grass field made inside Unreal Engine 5, made to be performant and dense.

title: Narrow Escape
description: Follow Anya as she escapes a trio of relenthless goons, Oscar, Manuel and Joseph, finding her way through a weird and confusing system of sewer pipes.

title: Papers Please: The Short Film - Spatial Audio Only Adaptation
description: An audio only adaptation of the Papers Please: The Short Film made by Nikita Ordynskiy.

title: Well of Wandering
description: Create generative music by manipulating the elements of the Well of Wandering.

title: God Simulator
description: Step on the shoes of God and watch over and aid a civilization in their survival. Or their demise.

title: Egg Hunt
description: Prototype game where you play as a bird tasked with gathering eggs and dropping them on a nest. The whole project, including the meshes and animations were done in WebGL.

title: WebGL Train Game
description: Prototype game where you can watch a train locomotive go around a circle train track, stopping at the various train stations for a time. The whole project, including the meshes and animations were done in WebGL.
